name: home-assistant
tagline: A local first home automation platform for controlling smart devices
description: Home Assistant is a popular open source home automation platform that runs locally and integrates with thousands of smart devices and online services. It provides dashboards, automations, voice control and a powerful extensible ecosystem.

features.title: Rich Text Editor
features.description: Visual editor, YAML configuration, Trigger-based actions. Automate your life

features.title: High Performance
features.description: No cloud required, Fast response, Privacy-focused. Keep it local

features.title: Energy Management
features.description: Monitor consumption, Solar tracking, Cost analysis. Save energy

features.title: Security
features.description: Camera integration, Alarm systems, Presence detection. Protect your home

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Customizable UI, Mobile apps, Tablet views. Beautiful interfaces
